award_title: Collaborative Research: Rotational Evolution and Angular Momentum Transport in Deeply Convective Dwarfs
subject: For when someone asks for your modified YREC setup
body:
Hi Jennifer,

Guessing you've fielded requests to share your angular momentum transport modelsâ€”then spent hours helping someone get dependencies sorted or parameter files working on their cluster.

I'm building Ouro so published simulation code becomes callable infrastructure. Others use your methods without you recreating environments or digging up old scripts.

If you've got 15 min in the new year to chat about what makes sharing this stuff painful, I'd love to hear it.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
